choices: with ashley(aboard captured covenant ccs battle cruiser `Glorious Transendence')
1.content: please select your setting!and write a story!oh and for all storys Ashley is considered dead until the moment of your chosing.
1.title: THE BEGINING!

info.brief_description: this story continues the sonic x story with a touch of everything.......
info.description: anyone can add to this story.rules are as follow: 1.must include main protagonist in some of your chapters. 2.no descriptive sex scenes please. 3.must have more than 3 sentences. 4.must have good grammer. 5.you must tll me before you add. 6.oc's welcome. 7.no fucking testimate of god shit in here. 8.trekie fans welcome. 9.have fun. 10.if you wanna put deadpool into your story go ahead,but put a shit just got weird sighn up first. 11.killing is allowed. 12 .you are free to have your story include vehicles or weapons from games,shows,and movies. 13.fan created skylanders welcome. 14.anything can happen. list of characters that I am putting in. protagonist:Ashley Tremortin. related famly:Eon(father)Violet(mother)Jynx(sister)Katie(sister)Lilith(sister)David(big brother).friends:Krystal. other characters:sonic,tails,blaze,silver,knuckles,amy,rouge,tikal,shadow,eggman,vanilla,cream,the babolyn rouges,honey the cat(will have Texan accent),vector,espio,charmy,metal sonic,sally acon(not a princes in this story),and any other sonic character I have missed. Factions that will be included:U.N.S.C.,the covenant,forerunners,G.U.N.,the eggman empire,Starfleet,C.O.G.,Umbrella,and anything else you can think of! ashleys powers(after infection):active regeneration,ability to mutate body parts for combat efficiency,can run In bursts of 250 mph,is a weapons expert,has an organic energy shield,master of a vast amount of martial arts,can leap 89 ft in the air,perfers 2 type 25 plasma rifles to close combat,has the ability to copy others appearance for a short time,is a brilliant stratigest,is calm and collected in battle,has eight forms for combat,can lift 300 times her size,powers are due to an infection she has,can utilize her natural born ability shadow phase to teleport or possess people.personality:doesnt exactly know a lot about civilian life and is often gender confused,i one of ONI's secret Spartan 2's,is not that femine,constantly keeps her A.I. mellisa with her,often aggressive,is very unsocial.you get the point..........STORY TIME!
